1466660.name: Project Space Hunter: Fear in Space
1466660.description:
Project Space Hunter: Fear in Space


Deep in space, where darkness and the unknown reign, your fight for survival begins. In "Project Space Hunter: Fear in Space" you take on the role of a brave robot who finds himself on an abandoned space station. But you are not alone. Something lurks in the shadows, something you've never seen before.

Every step could be your last as you uncover the station's secrets and try to find a way out. With stunning visuals, intense sound design and a captivating storyline, Project Space Hunter will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Are you ready to face your fears and fight the unknown? Download Project Space Hunter: Fear in Space now and find out!
1466660.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 荷兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
